title: Discussion-Based Constructivist Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment structured using real-time video conferencing systems and digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners enhance problem-solving abilities in real language usage contexts through discussion activities
Learners develop the competency to analyze language structures and cultural backgrounds in an integrated manner through discussions with peers
Learners can systematically reflect on their language acquisition processes through reflective journal writing
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
